name: Survel Squad
description:
Left-click: Interact, Reinforce Survels
Right-click: Punish Survels
"Slow mode" can be enabled in the options menu in the bottom-right corner.

"What you are about to see is top-secret information."

An entry in GDevelop Game Jam #2.

You are an agent of the CIA, and you have been entrusted with a strange mission: train a SQUAD of strange creatures known as SURVELS to solve mazes and retrieve sensitive Soviet files.

  • Reinforce or Punish Survels' choices to procure specific behaviors.
  • Deploy your SURVEL SQUAD to twenty bite-sized levels.
  • Retrieve every file, even the optional ones. It's a matter of national security.

[ Completion time: 5-20 minutes]
[ Options and progress is automatically saved ]

Credits:

Developer: Clark Padmore

  • Email: clarkpadmore@gmail.com

Music / Sound: created with DefleMask

Made with GDevelop 5

Special Thanks to the GDevelop Team for providing this opportunity to create and to share, and for creating an excellent game engine.

Mac / Linux Disclaimer: I do not currently have the resources to conduct proper software testing for Mac OS X and Linux platforms. Unforeseen bugs and incompatibilities may occur. If such things come to pass, do not be afraid to contact me at clarkpadmore@gmail.com to report errors or bugs.
